document_data.mainbody:
he Pantheistic College of Celestian was a temple in the city of Bral that was dedicated to Celestian the Star Wanderer, a deity originating from Greyspace that was popular among wildspace wanderers.
This temple was located in the Temple District of the Middle City of Bral, east across the road from the Pantheist Temple of Tyr and north of some polygot shrines.
This temple was one of the oldest within the city of Bral, having been established on the Rock of Bral back during its days of piracy.
Many spelljammer captains were known to visit this temple for a blessing before setting sail, due to Celestian being touted by his clergy as a patron of spelljammers.
